page.title: 04AN ORDINARY DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: It is now lunch time, one of the dinner ladies covers our desks with tablecloths and we eat our packed lunches. After lunch we can go out to play until 1 p.m. We played rounders again and had a good game. During afternoon school we read our reading books and did some topic work. Following our final playtime we have country dancing in our classroom once we have moved all the tables and chairs to the sides of the room.{ {Country dancing is good fun!} School closes at 3:15p.m. and I cycle home to Alvingham with Matthew. I ask mum if I can go out to play, she says "Yes". I play football with some other boys from the village. When I get home I have tea, it is spaghetti. After tea I go to the shed to get some kindling for the fire and I look at
